gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 128, Pistons 121
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Donovan Mitchell’s 45 points (20 in the fourth quarter), the Cavaliers defeated the Pistons, 128-121. Mitchell added six rebounds, eight assists and six 3PM, while Darius Garland added 19 points and three assists for the Cavaliers in his return after missing the previous 19 games. Danilo Gallinari tallied 20 points and four 3PM for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Cavaliers win their third straight game as they improve to 29-16 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 6-41.
